name: 萤火之森 (acei47)
description:
名为小烨的少女从小就有着一个魔法梦，她梦想着用魔法来让一家人过上美好的生活。但在现实，面对已然支离破碎的家庭，无力为力的小烨陷于苦闷之中。发生在现实的伤心事，在小烨的梦中化身成了可怕的怪物，不断折磨着小烨。而玩家则需要帮助小烨，在梦世界中运用魔法的力量战胜心魔。

玩家使用方向键控制小烨的移动，并点击鼠标左键发射子弹打击怪物。玩家需要一边收集用于发射子弹的资源，一边确保小烨不受怪物的伤害，并最终找到逃出梦世界的出口。梦世界里还存在着许多记忆碎片等待玩家的发现。找到记忆碎片，了解在这个年轻的女孩身上发生的故事，治愈她心灵的创伤，帮助她战胜心魔。

 

The young girl named Xiao Ye has a magic dream since she was a child. She dreams of using magic to make her family live a wonderful life. But in reality, in the face of the already fragmented family, powerless Xiao Ye trapped in depression. In the reality of sad things, in Xiao Ye's dream incarnate into a terrible monster, constantly tormenting Xiao Ye. And the player needs to help Xiao Ye, And players need to help Xiao Ye, in the dream world to use the power of magic to defeat the mind of the monster.

The player uses the direction key control Xiao Ye 's movement and clicks the left mouse button to launch the bullet to strike the monster. Players need to collect resources for firing bullets, while making sure Xiao Ye is not injured by the monster, and eventually find an exit out of the dream world. There are many fragments of memory waiting to be discovered in the dream world. Find the fragments, learn the story of what happened to this young girl, heal her wounds, and help her overcome her monster.
